metadata.title: CVE-2013-0180 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Insecure temporary file vulnerability in Redis 2.6 related to/tmp/redis.ds.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0180` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis-sentinel - 2:2.6.7-1
redis-server - 2:2.6.7-1
redis-tools - 2:2.6.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:2.6.7-1').
